S.FORM: tɕe nɯnɯ mbro ɯ-kɯ-lɤɣ to-sɯpa tɕe tɕendɤre nɯnɯ, nɤkinɯ ɲɯ-ŋu,
tɕe tɕetu tɯmɯ kɤrŋi to-ɕe tɕe,
nɯnɯ kɯ-fse aʑo a-khɯrma ra /kɯti/ to-ɕe kɤ-ti ɲɯ-ŋu (018)
tɯ-sŋi tɕe, nɤkinɯ, iɕqha tɕetu tɯmɯ kɤrŋi nɯ ɣɯ @yuhuangdadi nɯ kɯ, nɯnɯ nɤkinɯ, ɯʑo ɯ-pa ɣɯ ŋgumdʑɯɣ kɯ-xtɕi nɯra lonba to-sɯwum tɕe kɯ-rɤkrɤz jo-sɯɣe.
jo-sɯɣe tɕe tɕendɤre @donghailongwang nɯ kɯ, @aoguang nɯ kɯ to-sɤndʑɯ,
tɕe "@sunwukong kɯki nɤkinɯ, @shuijinggong nɯtɕu kɯ-ɣɤtɕɯqaʁ jɤ-ɣe tɕe,
tɕe nɯtɕu tɕe nɤkinɯ, mɤkɯftshi ʑo, iɕqha nɯ, iɕqha, (100)
@dinghaishen, nɯnɯ ɕom nɯ, ja-nɯtsɯm" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕe nɯ jamar tɕe tɕe,
@yanluowang tɕe iɕqha, χɕɯrʑi nɯ jo-ɣi tɕe,
nɯ kɯ "@sunwukong kɯ iʑora @difu nɯnɯ, iʑora ɣɯ nɯnɯ, ji-ndʐɯɣlɤm nɯra ɣɯ-tu-sɤtʂoʁloʁ ɲɯ-ŋu tɕe, (110)
tɤ-rmi thamtɕɤt ʑo ɲɤ-ɣɤme" to-ti.
nɯ jamar tɕe, @yuhuangdadi to-sɤmbrɯ.
@hailiaode, ki kɯ-fse /ɯβrɤ/ ki kɯ-fse mɤ-nɤjtshɯ, ki kɯ-fse mɤ-nɤjtshɯ" to-ti.
tɕe nɯɕimɯma ʑo, nɤki, ɯ-ʁmaʁmi pjɤ-sɯxɕe tɕe, @sunwukong /ɕ-ko-sɯndo/ (ɯ-kɯ-ndo pjɤ-sɯxɕe).
tɕe ɕ-ko-sɯndo tɕe tɕendɤre, @taibaijinxing kɤ-ti nɯnɯ, li nɤki ɲɯ-ŋu, fsraŋma ci ɲɯ-ŋu ma, nɯnɯ kɯ, nɤkinɯ, @yuhuangdadi ɯ-ɕki to-ti tɕe,
"kɯki, nɤki, rdɤstaʁ ɣzɯ kɯki rcanɯ, ɯʑo kɯ, li ɯʑo tɤ-kɯ-nɯ-sci tɕe, tɤ-kɯ-nɯ-sci kɯ-fse ɲɯ-ɕti tɕe, (150)
ɯʑo kɯnɤ iɕqha, nɤki, kɤ-rɤntshom kɯ-fse nɯnɯra, wuma ʑo cha tɕe,
nɯnɯ tɕendɤre, ɯʑo kɯnɤ fsraŋma ci kɤ-rtsi ɕti." to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕendɤre nɯ sɤznɤ, ɯ-khɯr ci pjɯ́-wɣ-ta kɯ ɲɯ-mna." to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu
"tɕe nɯnɯ mɯ-mɤ-ɲɯ-nɤpe qhe, tɕendɤre, nɯ kóʁmɯz nɤ kú-wɣ-sɯndo ɲɯ-pe" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕeri @yuhuangdadi kɯ "wo nɯnɯ, nɤj tu-tɯ-ti nɯ li ɲɯ-tɯ-ɣɤŋgi" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕendɤre nɯɕimɯma ʑo tɕe tɕe @taibaijinxing to-ɣɤxpra, tɕendɤre iɕqha nɯ, tɤscoz nɯ-kɤ-βzu nɯra pjɤ-sɯtsɯm.
tɕe @taibaijinxing nɯ @huaguoshan nɯtɕu jo-zɣɯt.
ɣzɯ ɣɯ ɯ-z-rɤʑi nɯtɕu jo-zɣɯt tɕe tɕendɤre,
nɤki @sunwukong pa-mto tɕe nɯnɯ, /yu/ tɯmɯ kɤrŋi kɯ tɤscoz /ɯ-scoz/ pɯ-kɤ-rɤt nɯnɯ to-tɕɤt tɕe, ko-ɕthɯz tɕe,
aʑo @taibaijinxing kɤ-ti nɯ ŋu-a, kɯki tɯmɯ kɤrŋi kɯ pɯ́-wɣ-sɯɣe-a tɕe,
"tɯmɯ kɤrŋi tɤ-ɣi tɕe, nɤki, nɤ-khɯr pjɯ-ta-j ŋu tɕe nɯ ɣɯ-nɯ-mɟe ɲɯ-ra" to-ti. (250 tɤɣi, tɤɣe?)
tɕendɤre @sunwukong kɯ ɲɤ-rga matɕi tɕe iɕqha "ɕɤxɕo aʑo, nɤki, tɯmɯ kɤrŋi tu-ɕe-a z-ɲɯ-ɤnɯɣro-a ra ntsɯ ku-sɯsam-a" ɲɤ-sɯso tɕe,
tɕendɤre nɯra to-ti, tɕe tɕendɤre "aʑo kɯnɤ tɯmɯ kɤrŋi ɕɤxɕo ʑatsa tu-ɕe-a ra ku-sɯsam-a" to-ti tɕe tɕendɤre
ɯ-zda ɣzɯ nɯra ɲɤ-βde tɕe tɕendɤre, nɤkinɯ to-ndo,
nɤki @jindouyun to-ndo tɕe tɕendɤre,
nɯ ɯ-taʁ zɯ to-ɕe tɕe, @linxiaodian nɯtɕu jo-ʑɣɤsɤzɣɯt.
tɕendɤre @yuhuangdadi kɯ nɯ @sunwukong, nɤkinɯ iɕqha, mbro kɯ-nɤpɯpa ju-sɯxɕe pjɤ-ŋu tɕe, (340)
@sunwukong kɯ kɯki tɕhi kɯ-nɤma, @bimawen nɯ tɕhi ɯ-kɯ-nɤma ŋu nɯ mɯ-pjɤ-tso.
tɕe "a-khɯr wuma kɯ-wxti ci pjɤ-ta ɲɯ-ŋu ɲɯ-sɯsɤm tɕe ɲɯ-rga.
tɕendɤre iɕqha nɯ, nɯ ɯ-kɯ-nɤma jo-ɕe ri, nɤki,
@bimawen nɯnɯ tɯmɯ kɤrŋi ra ɣɯ nɯ-mbro ɯ-kɯ-nɯkon kɯ-fse ci, ɯ-khɯr kɯ-xtɕɯ-xtɕi ci ɲɯ-ɕti ma, sna kɯ-tu pjɤ-maʁ wo.
tɕe tɯ-sŋi tɕendɤre, ɯ-zda ra li, hanɯni /nɯŋgu/ nɯ-khɯr kɯ-tu nɯra cho, ra cha pjɤ-k-ɤsɯ-tshi-nɯ-ci,
tɕe pjɤ-rga-nɯ ʑo tɕe tɕe, @sunwukong nɯ kɯ to-thu:
"ki @bimawen kɤ-ti nɯnɯ, ɯ-khɯr tɕhi jamar kɯ-wxti ci ŋu kɯ wo" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕeri ɯ-zda ra kɯ "kɯki, kɯki rcanɯ, maka kɤ-rtsɯz kɯ-me ci ʑo ɕti wo tɕe, nɤki, kɤ-rtsɯz kɯ-me ɣɯ ɯ-khɯr ci ɕti wo tɕe,
nɤki, mbro kɤ-nɤpɯpa tɤ́-wɣ-sɯpa nɤ tɕendɤre "nɯnɯ pjɤ-tɯ-pe" tu-ti. (428)
nɯnɯ mbro kɤ-sɤpe mɯ-mɤ-pɯ-kɯ-cha nɤ, tɯmqaj tuqhe? nɯ ŋu ma nɯ ma ɯ-khɯr ra kɯroz kɯ-wxti me wo" tu-ti. (435)
@sunwukong kɯ pjɤ-mtshɤm rcanɯ, ɯ-mbrɯ kɯ-wxtɯ-wxti ʑo to-ŋgɯ,
rcanɯ, ɯ-ɕɣa ra ɲɤ-sɤrŋɤɣndʑɯr ra to-ti tɕe:
ki tɯmɯ kɤrŋi rgɤtpu nɯ kɯ aʑo nɯ wuma ɲɯ́-wɣ-nɤkhe-a, artsɯz maŋe" to-ti. (450)
"a-rtsɯz mɯ́j-βze tɕe, aʑo @huaguoshan nɯtɕu, nɤki, rɟɤlpu ku-ndam-a, kɯ-pɯ-pe ku-nɯ-rɤʑi-a pɯ-ɕti ri,
maka aʑo pjɯ́-wɣ-nɯβlu-a tɕe ɯ-mbro ɯ-kɯ-lɤɣ tú-wɣ-sɯɣe-a."
nɯra to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕe "aʑo, nɤki, mɤ-nɤme-a" to-ti tɕe,
tɕendɤre nɯɕimɯma ʑo tɕe, /hula/ ɕlaʁ ʑo to-ndzur tɕe, tɕendɤre /@zhuozi ɯ-taʁ/ @zhuozi nɯra chɤ-pɣaʁ.
tɕendɤre ɯ-rna ɯ-ŋgɯ nɯtɕu @jingubang ɲɤ-tɕɤt.
tɕendɤre to-sɤjxɤlɤt ʑo tɕe nɤki, tɯmɯ kɤrŋi nɯra, to-sɤjxɤlɤt ʑo tɕe,
sala kɯndzur ra chɤ-βzu tɕe, @huaguoshan jo-nɯɕe.
tɕendɤre @shuiliandong ɯ-ʁɤri nɯtɕu, ɣzɯ ra nɯtɕu, nɤkinɯ,
@cao ra pjɤ-k-ɤsɯ-βzu-nɯ-ci tɕe, nɯra ɲɤ-sɯɣʑaʁ-nɯ pjɤ-ŋu ri, (540）
@sunwukong kɯ ɯ-xɕɤt tɯ-tu ʑo "e, kɯ-xtɕi ra, aʑo jɤ-nɯɣe-a" nɯra to-ti.
"aʑo @laosun ki jɤ-nɯɣe-a" nɯra to-ti tɕe,
ɣzɯ ɯ-pɯ nɯra jo-ɣi-nɯ tɕe, tsuku kɯ ɯ-pɕaʁ lo-βzu-nɯ,
tsuku kɯ maka, nɯ-jaʁ ra, nɤki nɤki tɕe, maka "jɤ-tɯ-nɯɣe papa" ra to-ti-nɯ,
tɕe @sunwukong kɯ ɯ-jaʁ ra to-sɤjxɤjxɤt tɕe, (600)
tɕe ɯ-mbrɯ ɯ-tɯ-ŋgɯ pjɤ-sɤre ʑo.
tɕendɤre aʑo @bimawen lú-wɣ-sɯ-ndo-a ɲɯ-ŋu, /nɯra ɲɯf/ nɯra pɯ-fse nɯra pɯ-raŋ,
pɯ-kɯ-fse nɯra, ɯ-zda ɣzɯ ra nɯ-tɯfɕɤt ɲɤ-βzu.
tɕe ɣzɯ ra kɯnɤ wuma to-sɤmbrɯ-nɯ tɕe,
iʑo ji-rɟɤlpu nɯsthɯci /nɤ/ nɤ-kɤ-tso kɯ-dɤn, nɤ-kɤ-spa kɯ-dɤn nɯnɯ, nɤki, /tɯmɯ cho kɤfsuja/ tɯmɯ kɤrŋi cho kɯ-ɤfsuja ɣɯ ɯ-rɟɤlpu lu-tɯ-ndɤm kɯnɤ, kɯ-tɕhom kɯ-tu me." to-ti-nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu.
"tɕhindʐa nɯ, nɤkinɯ, nɤki, tɯmɯ kɤrŋi rɟɤlpu ɣɯ ɯ-mbro tɯ-lɤɣ ɲɯ-ra?" to-ti-nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕe @sunwukong kɯ nɯra ta-tɯt-nɯ jamar qhe li ɲɤ-rga.
tɕendɤre "ɲɯ-pe, ɲɯ-pe" to-ti.
tɕendɤre nɤkinɯ, ɣzɯ kɯ-wxti ra nɯ-ɕki nɯtɕu, nɤkinɯ, iɕqha nɯ, kɯki ʁmaʁdɤr ci pjɤ-sɯrɤt, (655)
ɯ-taʁ nɯtɕu @qitiandasheng pjɤ-sɯrɤt.
tɕe nɯnɯ pjɤ-sɯrɤt tɕe tɕe nɯ, @shuiliandong ɯ-kɯm nɯnɯ, nɯnɯ praʁpa ɣɯ ɯ-kɯm nɯtɕu to-ɕɯɴqoʁ-nɯ.
tɕendɤre iɕqha tɯmɯ kɤrŋi kɯ @sunwukong kɯ, nɯ ɯ-khɯr ɲɤ-nɤxtɕi tɕe, @huaguoshan jɤ-anɯri tɕe, @qitiandasheng /ton/ to-nɯ-ʑɣɤpa tɕe nɯra pjɤ-mtshɤm.
tɕe li nɯ ɯ-βra ɯ-mbrɯ to-ŋgɯ.
tɕe nɯɕimɯma tɕe tɕendɤre @tuotalitianwang kɤ-ti nɯ, cho @nezhasantaizi nɯni, nɤkinɯ, ʁmaʁ ra to-sɯndo tɕe pjɤ-sɯxɕe tɕe,
ɯ-kɯ-ndo pjɤ-sɯxɕe-nɯ. (735)
tɕeri @julingshen nɯ, nɤkinɯ, li ɯ-ɕki nɯ iɕqha nɯ, li kɯ-ɤlɯlɤt jo-sɯɣe.
tɕendɤre @sunwukong pa-mto tɕe tɕendɤre, nɤki, @xuanhuadafu, nɯnɯ tɯrpa to-sɯ-ndo tɕe, (750, tondo, tosɯndo)
@sunwukong cho kɯ-ɤlɯlɤt jo-ɕe tɕe,
@sunwukong ɯ-taʁ nɯfse ʑo pjɤ-lɤt.
tɕeri @sunwukong kɯ @jingubang to-tɕɤt tɕe,
nɤki "bian" to-ti tɕe tɕendɤre, ɯ-jaʁ kɯ /josɯ/ jo-sɯ-sthoʁ tɕe tɕendɤre, @julingshen nɯ rcanɯ, ɯ-jaʁ nɯtɕu pjɤ-lɤt rcanɯ, ɯ-jaʁ koŋla ʑo chɤ-sɯndʑɯrpɯt ʑo.
chɤ-sɯndʑɯrpɯt ʑo qhe, tɕendɤre pjɤ-ɕɯnŋo.
tɕendɤre nɯ ɯ-mphru ʑo qhendɤre, @nezha nɯnɯ kɯ, nɤkinɯ iɕqha, /@ta/ @fenghuolun nɯnɯ pjɤ-zrɤtɕaʁ.
pjɤ-zrɤtɕaʁ qhe tɕendɤre...
smi tu-kɯ-ɬoʁ ci ɲɯ-ŋu wo, ma nɯnɯ pjɤ-zrɤtɕaʁ qhe, tɕendɤre @huntianling kɤ-ti nɯnɯ, @nezha nɯ kɯ to-lɤt qhe tɕendɤre,
nɯɕimɯma ʑo, nɤki, @shuiliandong nɯtɕu lo-rɟɯɣ.
tɕe @sunwukongkɯ pa-mto tɕe tɕendɤre,
"nɤʑo ɕɯ ra ɣɯ nɯ-pɤtso tɯ-ŋu? kukutɕu maka, ma-tɯ-sɤqhɯqha, ma-tɯ-rɯŋɯŋɤn ma mɤ-jɤɣ, jɤ-nɯɕe" nɯra to-ti.
tɕendɤre @nezha kɯ pa-mtshɤm tɕendɤre to-sɤmbrɯ.
"nɤʑo kɯki maka, ɣzɯ ra nɯ-ɬɤndʐi ki, nɤki, aʑo kɯki,
nɤ-mɲaʁ ɣɤʑu tɕe, @taishan mɤ-kɤ-mto nɯ ma-tɯ-βze ma, aʑo @nezha @santaizi kɤ-ti nɯ ŋu-a tɕe, (908)
aʑo kɯnɤ li a-ma kɯ-tu ju-ɣi-a ɕti tɕe nɤ-kɯ-ndo jɤ-ɣe-a ŋu." to-ti.
tɕendɤre @sunwukong kɯ, ɲɤ-nɤre tɕe, "nɤʑo kukutɕu pɤjkhu nɤ-nana?? ɣɯ ɯ-di /mɯkɤ/ mɯ-tɤ-kɯ-zbaʁ ɣɯ tɤ-pɤtso nɯ ɲɯ-tɯ-ɕti tɕe, (920)
aʑo nɤkinɯ, /nɤtshɤt/ nɤ-tshot tu-βze-a ŋu tɕe, (930)
"tɕhi nɤ-kɤ-cha nɯ tɤ-lɤt" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕe @nezha nɯ to-sɤmbrɯ tɕendɤre li "bian" to-ti tɕe tɕendɤre,
"ɲɯ-βzɟɯr" to-ti tɕe tɕe,
nɯɕimɯma ʑo ɯ-ku χsɯm kɯ-tu, ɯ-rpaʁ kɯtʂɤɣ kɯ-tu ɲɤ-ʑɣɤsɤpa tɕe, kɯ-ɤlɯlɤt jo-ɣi.
tɕe @sunwukong kɯ pa-mto tɕe tɕe li ɲɤ-nɤmtshɤr tɕe,
"kɯki tɤ-pɤtso ki, li ɲɯ-χɕu ɕti nɤ" nɯra ɲɤ-sɯso tɕe,
tɕendɤre @san, @jingubang χsɯm to-tɕɤt,
tɕendɤre @nezha nɯ ko-znɯtshɤβ. (1015)
tɕendɤre sqi, sqɯ-ɣjɤn jamar to-nɯ-rɤtshɤt-ndʑi ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕeri βʁɤnŋo pjɤ-me-ndʑi.
βʁɤnŋo pjɤ-me-ndʑi qhe tɕe nɯ @sunwukong, (kɯ) nɤkinɯ, hanɯni ɲɤ-nɯzdɯɣ. (1020)
nɯ jamar qhe, tɕendɤre ɯ-rme tɯ-ldʑa chɤ-phɯt.
@sunwukong kɯ ɯ-rme tɯ-ldʑa chɤ-phɯt qhe,
tɕendɤre nɯnɯ, nɯnɯ ɯ-rme tɯ-ldʑa nɯ kɯ @sunwukong ɯʑo /ɲɤ/ ɲɤ-ʑɣɤsɤβzu qhe, (1040)
nɯnɯ @nezha cho tɤ-kɯ-ɤlɯlɤt...
ɯʑo koŋla nɯnɯ, koŋla ɣɯ ɯ-phoŋbu nɯnɯ, @nezha ɯ-qhuchu tɕu jo-ɕe,
tɕendɤre @nezha ɯ-qhu nɯtɕu hanɯni kɯ-ɤχa ci pjɤ-tu qhe,
ɯnɯnɯtɕu, nɤki, @nezha ɣɯ ʁe ɯ-ʁla ɯ-ɕki nɯtɕu pjɤ-rtɤβ. (1100)
tɕe @nezha nɯnɯ, nɤkinɯ, tɕe nɯra, nɤkinɯ, @sunwukong ɯʑo wuma nɯnɯ, ʁnɯz ɲɤ-ʑɣɤsɤβzu ɕti qhe tɕe,
nɯnɯ kɤ-nɯʁɤri mɯ-pjɤ-cha qhe, tɕendɤre iɕqha nɯ, nɤkinɯ, @nezha pjɤ-ɕɯnŋo.
@nezha pjɤ-ɕɯnŋo qhe @tuotalitianwang nɯ kɯ "aʑo kɯki @sunwukong kɤ-nɯʁɤri mɤ-cha-a" ɲɤ-sɯso qhe,
tɕendɤre "a-pɯ-nɯɬoʁ-tɕi ɲɯ-mna" ɲɤ-sɯso ɲɯ-ŋu (1125)
tɕe pjɤ-ɕɯnŋo, @litianwang chondɤre, nɤkinɯ, @nezhasantaizi nɯni @sunwukong kɯ pjɤ-ɕɯnŋo ɲɯ-ŋu.
